00011 AManagedTask* AManagedTask::s_pManagedTaskListHead = NULL;

00013 AManagedTask::AManagedTask() {
00014        m_pNextManagedTask = NULL;
00015        AddToManagedTask(this);
00016 }
00017 
00018 AManagedTask::~AManagedTask() {
00019        RemoveFromManagedTask(this);
00020 }

00022 portBASE_TYPE AManagedTask::Create(const portCHAR * const pcName, unsigned portSHORT usStackDepth, unsigned portBASE_TYPE uxPriority) {
00023        return OnCreate(pcName, usStackDepth, uxPriority) &&
00024                      CTask::Create(AManagedTask::taskControlFunc, pcName, usStackDepth, this, uxPriority);
00025 }
00026 
00027 void AManagedTask::taskControlFunc(void *pParams) {
00028        static_cast<AManagedTask *>(pParams)->Run();
00029 }
00030 
00031 void AManagedTask::AddToManagedTask(AManagedTask *pTaskToAdd) {
00032        EnterCritical();
00033        // is the first element?
00034        if (s_pManagedTaskListHead == NULL) {
00035               s_pManagedTaskListHead = this;
00036        }
00037        else {
00038               // add the task to the head of the managed task list.
00039               m_pNextManagedTask = s_pManagedTaskListHead;
00040               s_pManagedTaskListHead = this;
00041        }
00042        ExitCritical();
00043 }
00044 
00045 void AManagedTask::RemoveFromManagedTask(AManagedTask *pTaskToRemove) {
00046        // search for the task to remove in the managed task list
00047        // is it the first element?
00048        EnterCritical();
00049        if (pTaskToRemove == s_pManagedTaskListHead) {
00050               s_pManagedTaskListHead = pTaskToRemove->m_pNextManagedTask;
00051               ExitCritical();
00052        }
00053        else {
00054               ExitCritical();
00055               CFreeRTOS::SuspendAllTasks();
00056               AManagedTask *pTask = s_pManagedTaskListHead;
00057               while (pTask != NULL && pTask->m_pNextManagedTask == pTaskToRemove) {
00058                      pTask = pTask->m_pNextManagedTask;
00059               }
00060               if (pTask != NULL) { // Check to be sure that the task is in the list
00061                      // remove the thask from the list
00062                      pTask->m_pNextManagedTask = pTaskToRemove->m_pNextManagedTask;
00063               }
00064               CFreeRTOS::ResumeAllTasks();
00065        }
00066 }
00067 
00068 bool AManagedTask::InitHardwareForManagedTasks() {
00069        bool bRes = true;
00070        for (AManagedTask *pTask=s_pManagedTaskListHead; pTask!=NULL; pTask=pTask->m_pNextManagedTask)
00071               bRes &= pTask->HardwareInit();
00072 
00073        return bRes;
00074 }
